title: Shinzo Abe, former Prime Minister of Japan, killed at age 67 in shooting attack as he delivered campaign speech
content:
1. Shinzo Abe, former Prime Minister of Japan, killed at age 67 in shooting attack as he delivered campaign speech  CBS News
  2. Former Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe assassinated during campaign speech, hospital officials confirm  Fox News
  3. Shinzo Abe Dies After Being Shot in Japan: Latest Updates  The New York Times
  4. Shinzo Abe Shooting: Japan, Known for Safety, Is in Shock  Bloomberg
  5. Abe shooting: why gun violence is so rare in zero-tolerance Japan  The Guardian
contentSnippet:

localize.title: 安倍晋三元首相、選挙演説中に銃撃され67歳で死去
日本前首相安倍晋三在发表竞选演讲时遭枪击身亡，享年67岁
日本前首相安倍晉三在發表競選演講時遭槍擊身亡，享年67歲
